about_the_game:
try to play, get punished. try again anyway.

A Wicked Game is the name of this game. What you will find, I hope, is an experience which will disorient and delight in unequal measure. This game wasn't made to be beaten, but maybe you still will.

Game Features:

  • No two playthroughs are the same! Work your way through a random selection of over 100 difficult and unique individual levels.

  • You will be at the whims and wills of your keyboard and mouse. Embrace the chaotic inputs of each moment, or perish.

  • Dissolve into the game's soothing and colorful environments as you fight for your life.

  • As you twist and contort, enjoy a cacophony of delightful sound effects including an entire keyboard of notes and sounds to compose with.

  • Didn't beat the game on your first attempt? Don't worry, just start over from the beginning.

warning: if you are on the gifted-kid-to-burnt-out-adult pipeline, some gameplay elements may be all too familiar.

name: a wicked game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: You understand this is a rule now, a hidden one. The rules aren't going to be posted, but they'll be taught to you anyway.
